data.text: @peterjwln @heathrowairport Hi Piotr, I'm sorry that you have not received your bag. Unfortunately, we the Social Media Team, have no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact stated on your Passenger Irregularity Report (PIR) [1/2]
@haribo0406 Hi, what route is it you are trying to book? An adult fare applies for anyone 12 and over.
@saradenovic Hi Sara, please use the link I have already provided. There you can claim it. Kind regards, Derya
@Aly_Dar8 Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly check the status of your refund request. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @saradenovic Hi Sara, we are sorry to hear that you are affected by a flight delay. In order to send us your compensation request please fill out the following contact form https://t.co/FNTSMN2dTe. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Fred_vBrain Hi Fred, we are very sorry to hear that you are affected by a flight irregularity. Please accept my sincere apologies. In order to send us your claim please use the following link https://t.co/Brcgjfkdmg. Kind regards, Derya
@blacklabeltrvl [2/2] airport, is where all information about your case is collected. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. Kind regards, Derya

@blacklabeltrvl [1/2] Hi, we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Please turn to the contact on your Property Irregularity Report or PIR–you’ve received the Property Irregularity Report at the Lost & Found counter at the https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @wakeyouupsanta Hi there, I'm really sorry that you couldn't fly as planned and that it caused you many troubles. To forward you case directly to the responsible colleagues, please fill out this form: https://t.co/Qtjv8UbeUo Kind regards, Daphne
@saradenovic Hi Sara, we are sorry to hear about this unfortunate situation and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@hardware_gina Hi Gina, happy to read that you enjoyed your flight with us! I hope we can welcome you on many more flights with us! 😊 Kind regards, Daphne

@shavonne_wager Hi, we’re sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. When you reported your missing bags you must've received a Passenger Irregularity Report with a contact to reach for updates. Please refer to the responsible colleagues from the report directly. BR, Christiane

urls.title: Travel preparations
urls.description: We do everything we can to ensure that you can travel safely and without worry. Read our safe travel guide and find out about our many other services.

data.text:
@Bounette2009 [2/2] We recommend that you inform yourself about the respective regulations of your country of departure and destination. Please use the following link https://t.co/RjQSRJZOVW in order to get further information. 
Best regards, Shawn

data.text:
@Bounette2009 [1/2] Hi Bounette,
Thank you for getting in touch. Generally speaking, our mask obligation has been lifted. However, please note that depending on the country of origin and destination, wearing a mask on board may be mandatory.

@biebzi87 Hi there, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. Please send us your booking code and your new required flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@crystaljordan Hi Crystal, please enable PM. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@crystaljordan We will also send you a PM with an email contact for luggage tracing. Kind regards, Lyndsay [2/2]

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @crystaljordan Hi, we are sorry for your experience. Please be assured that as an international company with employees from around the world we explicitly dissociate ourselves from any kind of discrimination. To claim expenses, please use the following form: https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 [1/2]

@wooschnick Hi, we're sorry to hear you have been affected by a flight cancellation. Please send us a PM with your booking code and we'll check for an alternative for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@crystaljordan Hi Crystal, we are really sorry about the delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Hilfe & Kontakt
urls.description: Sie haben Fragen rund um Ihre Reservierungen, Ihren Flug oder Ihr Gepäck? Kontaktieren Sie uns über unser Kontaktformular.Wir helfen Ihnen gerne weiter.

data.text: @AlexMuehlbacher Hi Alex, es tut uns sehr leid, dass dein Gepäck nicht rechtzeitig geliefert wurde. Bei verspätetem Gepäck fülle bitte unser Online Formular aus: https://t.co/OgCdJkz5XM Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay

@_heykayyy @edelweiss_air @flyswiss [1/2] Hi there, 
We’re sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. We want you to know that we can completely understand your anger but we can’t offer an immediate solution in this case.

@_heykayyy @edelweiss_air @flyswiss [2/2] Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. 
Best regards, Shawn

data.text:

@WillHar03138840 [1/2] Hi Will,
I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@PhilipWell Hi, we currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. If there's anything we can assist you with please be specific and send us your booking reference and/or your ticket number in a DM. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@HijinxxGK Hi there, according to the reservation, he has already been rebooked to flights via Munich. Best regards, Christiane

data.text:
@print_expert Hi there Steve,

https://t.co/lQ0BbSodym
Kind Regards, Alessandra

data.text: @petersu73700629 Hi there, we regret to hear you were facing difficulties with the booking of your dog. To bring your feedback to notice please fill out the following contact form https://t.co/H47kr4v9Jy. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @eribarb Hi Erica, please try to use the desktop version https://t.co/XDgRxACySX. Kind regards, Christine
@shreddo2 Hi, please send us your booking code via a DM so that we can have a closer look. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine

@faiizalicious Hi there, thank you for taking the time to share your nice experiences with us. We are happy you felt comfortable when traveling with us. Looking forward to welcoming you on board soon again. Kind regards, Derya
@Souss82 (2/2) contact you directly for the further handling of your case in due time. I appreciate your patience in the meantime. Best regards, Alessandra

@Souss82 (1/2) Hello,
I understand that you would like to see this resolved as soon as possible. Please, be aware that due to high volumes the reply may take longer. Rest assured that my colleagues of Customer Care handle each case individually and carefully. They will

@rebeccaellis10 Hi Rebecca, please mind that due to the considerable amount of inquiries sent to us you may experience longer waiting times at the moment. We are doing our best and will reply to your concern as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards, Derya

@CryptoBnv74 Hi, I am sorry to hear. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status about your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessandra

@oppositeofleft3 Dear Jacob, I am sorry to hear. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status about your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeIKQj2 Best regards, Alessa

@BjornSensen Hi Bjorn, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. If we do not find your bag within five days, please send the completed Baggage Questionnaire Form to vielzos@austrian.com. https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: FAQ Baggage
urls.description: Here you can find frequently asked questions and answers about the topic of baggage.

data.text: @rebeccaellis10 Hi, please send the completed Baggage Questionnaire Form to vielzos@austrian.com. You will find the form via this link: https://t.co/zYZtOhTdtg . Please scroll down to "Delayed or damaged baggage" and then click on the second question. Kind regards, Funda
@LukasMinkov Hi there, how exactly can we assist you? Kind regards, Chris

data.text:
@nicoleeeeburns (2/2) PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you.
Best regards, Alessandra

@nicoleeeeburns Dear Nicole, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or

@anotherDougR (1/2) Hello Doug,
I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs.

@markbruin Dear Mark,
we're sorry you are still waiting regarding your claim. Our customer relations team are working through a high volume of cases and it's taking a lot longer than they'd like to respond. Please bear with us as little longer and a member of the team will be in touch soon

@nassia_g [2/2] Still, we can assure you that our colleagues are doing their best to get back to you as soon as possible.  
Best regards, Shawn

@nassia_g [1/2] Hallo Nassia,
Unfortunately, we cannot tell you exactly when you will receive a response since your case has to be handled by various different departments.

urls.title: Delayed or damaged baggage
urls.description: Did your case not arrive or did it arrive damaged? No worries, we will take care of this. Read important information about this eventuality.

data.text: @markbruin Hi Mark, I'm sorry that you're still waiting for your luggage. Here you can track the status of your bag: https://t.co/1DV32ZfScp Kind regards, Daphne

@sachark [2/2]Bitte wende dich an den Kontakt, den du auf dem Property Irregularity Report oder PIR findest – den Property Irregularity Report hast du am Lost&Found Schalter bekommen, und darauf sind alle Infos zu deinem Fall vermerkt. Die Ansprechperson dort hilft dir gerne weiter. LG
@sachark [1/2] Hallo Sachar, es tut uns sehr leid, dass dein Gepäck nicht mit dir angekommen ist. Bitte entschuldige die Unannehmlichkeiten.

@mechnight24 [2/2]  Bitte wende dich an den Kontakt, den du auf dem Property Irregularity Report oder PIR findest – den Property Irregularity Report hast du am Lost&Found Schalter bekommen, und darauf sind alle Infos zu deinem Fall vermerkt. Die Ansprechperson dort hilft dir gerne weiter.
@mechnight24 [1/2] Hallo Ksenija, es tut uns leid, dass dein Gepäck nicht mit dir angekommen ist. Bitte entschuldige alle Unannehmlichkeiten.
@pointsintheair Hi, bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode und deine Anfrage in einer DM. Wir sehen uns das gerne für dich an. Liebe Grüße, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

urls.title: Übergepäck - Austrian Holidays
urls.description: Ist Ihr Freigepäcksstück schwerer oder größer als erlaubt oder wollen Sie zusätzlich zu Ihrer Freigepäckserlaubnis weitere Gepäcksstücke mitnehmen, handelt es sich hierbei um Übergepäck. Anzahl: Auf Anfrage Dimension: max. 203 cm (Berechnung: Länge + Breite + Höhe = Dimension) Gewicht: max. 32 kg Die angeführten Preise verstehen sich pro Strecke, Gepäcksstück und Passagier. Berechnung der Dimension: Länge + Breite + Höhe = Dimension. max. 23 kg 158 cm bis 203 cm EUR 50,- 24 - 32 kg max. 158 cm EUR 50,-

I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@_grisou_ Hi Grisou, grundsätzlich wird Handgepäck am Check-in und nach Möglichkeit am Flugsteig kontrolliert. Gerne kannst du uns deine Flugdaten per PM schicken und wir leiten dein Feedback weiter. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay
@siracha44058846 Hi, here is the link https://t.co/VhdoTGlT31 Kind regards, Lyndsay

data.text: @anorok77 your PIR (Passenger Irregularity Report) The colleagues will gladly help you. If not, you can fill the form out here: https://t.co/VqEglRSgHU Kind regards, Daphne [2/2]

@anorok77  Hi there! I'm sorry that you're still missing your bag. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Did you already file a claim? If yes, please refer to the contact stated in [1/2]
@michelmehle Hi Michel, schicke uns bitte deinen Buchungscode per PN und wir schauen uns das gerne an. 😊 Liebe Grüße, Daphne

@rebeccaellis10 Hi Rebecca, as you have already been informed, we can’t offer an immediate solution in this case, unfortunately. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. Best regards, Christiane

@kevinraabe2 Hi Kevin, please note that all forgotten items are handed over to the Airport's Lost & Found department by the cleaning crew and are not being taken care of by our own staff. Please contact the airport'S lost property office directly. Best regards, Christiane

@Laadybuuug [2] Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests. 
Best regards, Shawn
